name: Marble Clash Classic
description:
Deep in the Gobi Desert,there's a legend saying that in the world there are seven kind of colorful marbles that come into being when the world was first created by god,god created one marble each day and buried them somewhere deep for us to find.Those colorful god made marbles are blessings and people's lucky marble. Then someday,some color marbles well out from somewhere,and there's a saying that chose marbles are the god made marbles containing magic tricks and collecting them will bring you good luck and blessings,but first you have to collect them,rule is simply,match 3 or more of them with same color and they will vanish and become your lucky marbles. You may create combos to get more bonus score, more consecutive marble blast,higher score bonus.
You can make use of function marbles to help you solve the tricky issues during the process.
